query: query($owner: String!, $repo: String!, $after: String) { repository(owner: $owner, name: $repo) { labels(first: 100, after: $after) { edges { node { id name description color } } pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } } } }

query($owner: String!, $repo: String!, $after: String) { repository(owner: $owner, name: $repo) { milestones(first: 100, after: $after) { edges { node { id title } } pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } } } }

query($owner: String!, $repo: String!, $after: String) { repository(owner: $owner, name: $repo) { releases(first: 100, after: $after) { edges { node { id tagName name publishedAt url } } pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } } } }

query($owner: String!, $repo: String!, $tagName: String!, $after: String) { repository(owner: $owner, name: $repo) { ref(qualifiedName: $tagName) { target { ... on Commit { history(first: 100, after: $after) { edges { node { id oid message } } pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } } } } } } } }

query($owner: String!, $repo: String!, $commitSHA: GitObjectID!, $after: String) { repository(owner: $owner, name: $repo) { object(oid: $commitSHA) { ... on Commit { associatedPullRequests(first: 10, after: $after) { edges { node { id title url labels(first: 10) { edges { node { id name description color } } } milestone { id title description dueOn } } } pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } } } } } } }

query($owner: String!, $repo: String!, $after: String) { repository(owner: $owner, name: $repo) { issues(first: 100, after: $after) { edges { node { number title labels(first: 10) { edges { node { id name description color } } } milestone { id title description dueOn } timelineItems(first: 100) { nodes { ... on ConnectedEvent { createdAt subject { ... on PullRequest { number title url headRefName mergedAt } } } } } } } pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } } } }
